trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 인덱스에서 개별적으로 액세스할 수 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 멤버에 설명 된 대로 정확히 동작 언급 했 듯이 점을 제외 하 고는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, 및 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>설명서.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the PathSegmentCollection class provides several special features: PathSegmentCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable 기능:** 에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>클래스 PathSegmentCollection 클래스는 여러 가지 특수 기능을 제공: PathSegmentCollection 개체를 여러 개체 간에 공유로 선언, 성능 향상을 위해 읽기 전용, 복제 및 가집니다 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 참조는 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 암시적 컬렉션 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* 하나 이상의 개체 요소 구문을 사용 하 여 선언 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> 의 지정된 된 컬렉션을 사용 하 여 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that make up the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 구성 하는 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: collection is .
trans-unit.target: collectionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> 의 개수나 지정된 된 용량을 사용 하 여 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 개체의 컬렉션은 처음 저장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 수가 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 개체의 컬렉션은 처음 저장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 컬렉션의 끝에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>개체에서 파생 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, 사용 될 때 복사 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 나중에 검색 하거나 제거 못할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>원래를 사용 하 여 컬렉션에 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>컬렉션은 원래 복사본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>다른 것으로 간주 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>추가한 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 구현과 달리 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>,이 구현에서 throw 한 <xref:System.ArgumentException>추가 하려고 하면는 **null** (**Nothing**) 참조 합니다.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The segment to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 추가할 세그먼트입니다.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of all segments and resets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*> to zero.
trans-unit.target: 모든 세그먼트의 컬렉션을 지우고 다시 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>0.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection> 의 용량을 변경 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>,이 개체 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사 하는 경우이 메서드는 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 복사 (하지만 이러한 요소는 더 이상 확인) 나 하지 않습니다 애니메이션의 현재 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체의 수정 가능한 복제본입니다.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 됩니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> 개체를이 개체의 현재 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사 되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체의 수정 가능한 복제본입니다.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 됩니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Boolean>나타내는 있는지 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 컬렉션에 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 을 찾으려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 컬렉션 내에 포함 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 전체 복사 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> 를&1; 차원 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> 대상 배열의 지정된 된 인덱스에서 시작 하는 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 항목을 복사할은 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of `array` at which to start copying the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 `array` 의 콘텐츠 복사를 시작 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index가&0; 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: array가 다차원 배열인 경우

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of items in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -또는-소스 항목 수가 에서 사용 가능한 공간 보다 큰 index 대상의 끝에 array합니다.

trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 경로 세그먼트의 수를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of path segments contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 경로 세그먼트의 수는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의 데이터 읽기를 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 내부 컬렉션을 수정 하 여 열거자를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 열거자는 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: 또한이 위치로 복원 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에서, 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>예외를 throw 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>하 여 열거자 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 의 값을 읽기 전에 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목을</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 호출 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>될 때까지 동일한 개체를 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>다음 항목으로.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 끝이 전달 된 후 열거자는 컬렉션의 마지막 항목 뒤에 배치 하 고 호출 되 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>반환 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>반환 `false`호출, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>예외를 throw 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>다시, 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목 호출 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>그 뒤 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> 설정 하려면

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션이 변경 되지으로 유효한 상태를 유지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 무효화 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> throw</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> 또는</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 을 다음에 호출할 등 추가, 수정 또는 삭제 항목 컬렉션을 변경 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 사이 컬렉션이 수정 되는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>열거자가 이미 무효로 되 었 하는 경우에로 설정 되어 있는 항목을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션에 배타적으로 액세스가 없습니다. 따라서 컬렉션을 열거 것은 본질적으로 스레드로부터 안전한 프로시저가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 동기화 되어 있을 때 다른 스레드에서 수 수정할 열거자에서 예외가 발생 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 열거 동안 스레드 보안을 보장 하려면 전체 열거 동안 컬렉션을 잠글 하거나 다른 스레드에서 변경 된 내용으로 인해 발생 한 예외를 catch 합니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>컬렉션을 반복할 수 있는.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>
